main event: A sighting of an elongated aerial phenomenon was reported on 3 September 1957 in Yuma, Arizona.
interesting points: The object had ragged edges and measured about 1 foot in length., The sighting lasted approximately 7 minutes., The object was observed drifting at about a 30-degree azimuth before it disappeared from sight., It was described as having a brown middle with brown trailing edges., The phenomenon is believed to be either a meteor or meteor-like in nature.
sighted object: elongated aerial phenomenon with ragged edges
witness description: The report details observations made by a military personnel during daytime conditions.
